title: On first Africa trip, Blinken confronts questions of U.S. leverage in multiple deepening crises
content:
1. On first Africa trip, Blinken confronts questions of U.S. leverage in multiple deepening crises  The Washington Post
  2. Crises in Sudan and Ethiopia Worsen as Blinken Begins Africa Visit  The New York Times
  3. Blinken, in Kenya, seeks to cool regional crises  Associated Press
  4. Secretary of State Antony Blinken making 1st trip to Africa amid growing crises in Ethiopia, Sudan  ABC News
  5. Intractable African Crises Flare as Biden’s Top Diplomat Visits Kenya  The New York Times

localize.title: 初のアフリカ訪問で、深刻化する複数の危機に対する米国の影響力の問題に直面したBlinken氏
